<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grippli Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2830) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Grippli Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2818)

</column>

---

You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), or [grippli](/Traits.aspx?ID=264) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
